plates.title: About
plates.longHtml:
Building Smart Systems That Grow Businesses

Kairo Studio is a marketing and automation agency focused on building data-driven systems that scale. From automated lead funnels and CRM integrations to full SaaS platforms and performance marketing, we design solutions that deliver measurable ROI.

Our Focus Areas

  • Marketing Automation
  • SaaS Development
  • Performance Marketing
  • Analytics & Dashboards

"Kairo Studio transformed our entire marketing operation with intelligent automation that just works."

plates.title: Work
plates.longHtml:
Real Projects. Real Automation. Real Results.

We design end-to-end systems that solve business problems. Below are selected case studies showing strategy, implementation, and measurable outcomes.

Vellapanti — Youth Entertainment Platform

vellapanti.co.in

Scalable content workflow, SEO optimization, analytics integration, and automated publishing system for India's fastest-growing youth entertainment platform.

SaaSAutomationSEOAnalytics

Challenge

  • Manual content publishing taking 3+ hours daily
  • Inconsistent SEO implementation
  • No analytics tracking
  • Poor mobile performance

Solution

  • Custom CMS with automated workflows
  • AI-powered SEO optimization
  • Real-time analytics dashboard
  • Progressive Web App architecture

Tech Stack

React, Node.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, AWS, Cloudflare

plates.title: Services
plates.short: How We Turn Ideas Into Systems That Scale
plates.longHtml:
How We Transform Ideas Into Systems That Scale

Our 4-phase process ensures clarity, measurable KPIs, secure engineering, and continuous growth.

1. Discovery

Deep dive into your business goals, user needs, and technical requirements. We map out the entire automation ecosystem.

2. Architecture

Design scalable system architecture with clear data flows, integrations, and performance benchmarks.

3. Design & Build

Iterative development with weekly demos, continuous testing, and user feedback integration.

4. Optimize & Scale

Performance tuning, A/B testing, conversion optimization, and automated scaling infrastructure.

Core Services

  • SaaS Development — Full-stack web applications with automated billing, user management, and analytics
  • Marketing Automation — Lead nurturing, email sequences, CRM integration, and conversion funnels
  • Performance Marketing — Paid campaigns, attribution modeling, ROI tracking, and optimization
  • CRM Integrations — Salesforce, HubSpot, Pipedrive custom workflows and data sync
  • Analytics & Dashboards — Real-time metrics, custom reports, and data visualization
  • Conversion Optimization — A/B testing, heatmaps, user session analysis, and UX improvements

plates.title: Contact
plates.longHtml:
Let's Build Your Automation Ecosystem

Tell us about your project. We'll respond within 24 hours, offer a free consultation, and send a custom proposal. No obligation.

We respect your privacy. Your information will only be used to respond to your inquiry. We typically respond within 24 hours during business days.

Email: support@kairostudio.in

Phone: +91 866-884-4178

Hours: Mon–Fri 9AM–6PM IST
